snippet: Jacob Sabbagh was arrested in Brooklyn on charges he had encounters with the girl in a three-year period beginning in 2005 when she was 10.
abstract: New York City Police Dept reports Officer Jacob Sabbagh has been arrested and charged with sexual abuse of family friend's daughter.
lead_paragraph: Jacob Sabbagh was arrested in Brooklyn on charges he had encounters with the girl in a three-year period beginning in 2005 when she was 10.

headline.main: Police Officer Accused of Sexually Abusing a Family Friend’s Daughter
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Is Charged With Sexual Abuse of Girl
